## Biography
I am an enthusiastic software developer currently pursuing Master's in Computer and Information Science. I enjoy problem solving using programming. Along with software development, my current interests are also in the field of data science and machine learning. I want to embrace the powers of these technologies and create useful applications. My other interests include painting and drawing.
